question: Which one of the following is NOT a method used for logging messages in a server-side script for a privately-scoped application?
explanation: gs.log() is not available in scoped applications; use gs.info(), gs.error(), etc.

question: If the Create module field is selected when creating a table, what is the new module's default behavior?

options.A: Open an empty form so new records can be created
options.B: Open a link to a wiki article...
options.C: Display an empty homepage for the application
options.D: Display a list of all records from the table

question: How must Application Access be configured to prevent all other private application scopes from creating configuration records on an application's data tables?

options.A: Create Access Controls instead of using Application Access
options.B: Set Accessible from to All application scopes and de-select Can create
options.C: Set Accessible from to This application scope only and de-select web services
options.D: Set the Accessible from field value to This application scope only

question: What are some of the benefits of extending an existing table such as the Task table when creating a new application?

statement_options.a: You can repurpose existing fields by simply changing the label.
statement_options.b: Use existing fields with no modifications.
statement_options.c: Existing logic from the parent table will be automatically applied to the new table.
statement_options.d: All of the parent table records are copied to the new table.

explanation: Extending a table inherits fields and logic, but does not copy the actual records to the new table[cite: 529, 530, 531, 537].

question: When configuring an Access Control which has no condition or script, which one of the following statements is NOT true?

options.A: table.* will grant access to every field in a record
options.B: table.None will grant access to every record on the table
options.C: table.field will grant access to a specific field in a record
options.D: table.id will grant access to a specific record on the table

question: Which of the following methods are useful in Access Control scripts?
Which one of the following client-side scripts apply to Record Producers?

options.A: Catalog Client Scripts and Catalog UI Policies
options.C: UI Scripts and Record Producer Scripts

question: When a ServiceNow instance requests information from a web service, ServiceNow is the web service:
Which one of the following is the fastest way to create and configure a Record Producer?

options.A: Create a Catalog Category, then select Add New Record Producer
options.B: Use the Record Producer module then add variables manually
options.C: Open the table in the Table records and select the Add to Service Catalog Related Link
options.D: Open the table's form and select the Create Record Producer menu item

question: Which objects can you use in a Scheduled Script Execution (Scheduled Job) script?
Can inherited fields be deleted from a table?

options.B: Yes, but only if they are text fields
options.C: Yes, but only if there has never been any saved field data
options.D: No, inherited fields cannot be deleted from a child table

question: What is the purpose of the Application Picker?

options.B: Select an application as a favorite
options.C: Choose an application to edit and set the Application Scope
options.D: Choose an application to download and install

question: What are Application Files in a ServiceNow application?

options.A: An XML export of an application's table records
options.B: CSV files containing data imported into an application
options.D: XML exports of an application's Update Set

question: Which one of the following is NOT true for Modules?

options.B: Access to Modules is controlled with roles
options.C: Every Module must be part of an Application Menu
options.D: Every Module must be associated with a table

question: A graphical view of relationships among tables is a <blank>.
Which one of the following is true for the Application Picker?

options.A: All custom application scope and the Global scope appear in the Application Picker
options.B: All applications in ServiceNow appear in the Application Picker
options.C: Only custom applications appear in the Application Picker
options.D: Only downloaded applications appear in the Application Picker

question: When creating an application through the Guided Application Creator, which of the following is a user experience option?
When writing a Client Script to provide feedback targeted at a specific field, which method should be used?
Which actions can a Business Rule take without scripting?

options.A: Set field values and write to the system log
options.B: Set field values and generate an event
options.C: Set field values and add message
options.D: Set field values and query the database

question: Which server-side object provides methods for working with dates when writing a script in a privately scoped application?
Application developers can specify which ServiceNow page a user sees after submitting a new record using the Record Producer UI. How is the page specified?

options.A: Create an application property to store the URL
options.B: Configure the page in the Module that opens the Record Producer UI
options.C: Write an after Business Rule script: window.redirect = '<URL>';
options.D: Write a script in the Record Producer's Script field: producer.redirect = '<URL>';

question: Identify characteristic(s) of a Record Producer. (Choose three.)

options.A: All records created are inserted into the Requested Item table.
options.B: Each field prompts the user with a question rather than a field label.
options.D: You can script behaviors of fields in the user interface.
options.E: Graphics can be included on the user interface.

question: Which server-side API debug log method is available for scoped applications?
Which script types execute on the server? (Choose three.)
What is the best UX format to use for lists and forms?
When creating a table in a privately-scoped application, which four Access Controls are created for the table?
Which one of the following is true for this script fragment? g_user.hasRole('x_my_app_user');

options.B: The method returns false only if the user has the role
options.C: The method returns true only if the user has the role
options.D: The method returns true if the user has the role OR the admin role

question: Which one of the following database operations cannot be controlled with Application Access?
For Application Access there is a configuration option called Allow access to this table via web services. Which one of the following statements is true when this option is selected?

options.A: Option restricts delete via web services but read is always allowed
options.B: Even when not selected, users with permissions can access records
options.C: Restricts only SOAP but not REST
options.D: The user performing the query via web services must have the correct permissions

question: Which of the following statements must evaluate to true for a user to pass an Access Control? (Choose three.)

options.A: The user has one of the roles specified in the Required roles related list.
options.B: Scripts configured in the Access Control must evaluate to true.
options.C: Other matching Access Controls for the records evaluate to true.
options.D: Conditions configured in the Access Control must evaluate to true.
options.E: The user must be granted access through a business rule.

question: What is a workflow context?

options.B: It is generated from a workflow version, executes activities, and follows transitions
options.C: The business reason for which a workflow is designed
options.D: It is a checked out workflow

question: Which one of the following is a benefit of creating an Application Properties page for each application you develop?

options.A: Allows overriding application properties inherited from ServiceNow
options.B: Is a good landing page for an application
options.C: Allows a developer or admin to make changes to behavior without modifying artifacts
options.D: Users know to go there to change appearance

question: Which one of the following is NOT an example of when an application might use a Scheduled Script Execution (Scheduled Job)?

options.B: Run a clean up script on the last day of every month
options.C: Query the database every day for unassigned records
options.D: Run a client-side script at the same time every day

explanation: Scheduled Jobs run on the server, not the client.

question: Which one of the following objects CANNOT be used in a Script Action script?
How does ServiceNow match inbound email to existing records?
When debugging Email Notifications, what must you check on a user record? (Choose three.)

options.D: User must not be locked out.
options.E: Email field must have a value.

question: What are web services?

options.A: Methods used to create UI Pages
options.B: Methods used to allow applications to connect to other applications over a network

question: Which of the following methods is NOT part of the ServiceNow REST API?
MyApp application has a table, Table A. When MyApp is installed, you want Table A's records installed as part of the app. Records are installed when:

options.A: Table A is active and extends Task
options.B: Table A's records are added using Create Application Files context menu
options.C: Table A has an automatic number counter
options.D: Table A is not in the System Clone exclude list

question: How can an application link to a repository behind a firewall?
What is the ServiceNow store?

options.D: Marketplace for certified ServiceNow applications and integrations

question: Which of the following statements is NOT true for the Form Designer?

options.A: To add a section to the form layout, drag it from the Field Types tab to the desired destination on the form.
options.B: To add a field to the form layout, drag the field from the Fields tab...
options.C: To remove a field from the form layout, hover... and select Delete (X).
